definitions.definition: A requirement for something; something needed .
examples: There's no need to speculate; we can easily find out for sure.
She grew irritated with his constant need for attention.
Our needs are not being met.
I've always tried to have few needs beyond food, clothing and shelter.

definitions.definition: Lack of means of subsistence; poverty; indigence; destitution.

main_definition: ( countable and uncountable ) A requirement for something; something needed .
secondary_definitions: Lack of means of subsistence; poverty; indigence; destitution.
